name: Miami Cruise
description: Miami Cruise is a game inspired by retrowave aesthetics. Take a ride, and chill out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: i3 1.8 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 720 / Intel HD 520 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 2.6Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
